summary: Come Swim is a 2017 American short film written and directed by Kristen Stewart. It was shown in the 70th Anniversary Events section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival, and was part of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. The short was produced by David E. Shapiro of Starlight Studios, who worked with Stewart for a period of approximately three years. The film was streamed from November 10, 2017.
cast: Josh Kaye is the only acting cast of the film. Sydney Lopez provides voice-over.
